sentences.en: Aconitum is one of an important officinal and noxious plant.
sentences.cn: 乌头是一种重要的药用和有毒植物之一.

sentences.en: And children were warned not to play outside in the noxious air.
sentences.cn: 儿童更接获警告,不要到外面有毒的空气中玩耍.

sentences.en: Hazardous Decomposition Products: Formation of combustible and noxious fumes during thermal decomposition.
sentences.cn: 危害分解物: 热分解时会产生可燃有毒气体.

sentences.en: He strove to tear himself away from the noxious siren that had bewitched him.
sentences.cn: 他极力想从这个蛊惑了他的有害无益的海妖身边挣脱开.

sentences.en: He's a crank, and a noxious crank.
sentences.cn: 他是个怪人, 而且还是个极为有害的怪人.

sentences.en: He's a crank, and a noxious crank. He calls himself an idealist.
sentences.cn: 他是个怪人, 而且还是个极为有害的怪人, 他自称是理想主义者.

sentences.en: Heavy industry pollutes our  rivers with noxious chemicals.
sentences.cn: 重工业产生的有毒化学品会污染我们的河流。

sentences.en: Heavy industry pollutes our rivers with noxious chemicals.
sentences.cn: 重工业产生的有毒化学品会污染我们的河流。

sentences.en: Many household products give off noxious fumes.
sentences.cn: 很多家用产品散发有害气体。

sentences.en: Noxious chemicals are found in the river water.
sentences.cn: 河水里发现了有毒化学物品.

sentences.en: Noxious gases had built up in the sewer.
sentences.cn: 下水道的有害气体越积越多.

sentences.en: Still I seek the most noxious herbs.
sentences.cn: 我仍旧在寻找最毒的药草.

sentences.en: They gave off a most noxious smell.
sentences.cn: 它们散发出一种非常难闻的气味.

sentences.en: They were as a few fragrant flowers amidst a dense accumulation of noxious weeds.
sentences.cn: 她们就象大丛毒草中的几朵香花.
